Uses of Class
com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.ShapeStrokeBuilder

  • Packages that use ShapeStrokeBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder  

    • Uses of ShapeStrokeBuilder in com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder that return ShapeStrokeBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.interpolatedInterval(int interval)
      Specifies the interval at which each stroke will be stamped.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofCircle(int diameter)
      Creates a circular stroke of a specified diameter.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofHorizontalLine(int length)
      Creates a horizontal line stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofLine(int length, int width, double rotationDegrees)
      Creates a linear stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofOval(int width, int height)
      Creates an oval stroke of a specified width and height.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofQuadrilateral(Quadrilateral quadrilateral)
      Creates a quadrilateral stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofRectangle(int width, int height)
      Creates a rectangular stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofRegularPolygon(int sides, int sideLength, double rotationDegrees)
      Creates a regular polygon stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofRoundRectangle(int width, int height, int arc)
      Creates a round rectangle stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofShape(Shape shape)
      Creates a stroke of an arbitrary shape.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofSquare(int size)
      Creates a square stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofText(String text)
      Creates a stroke whose shape is a provided string (rendered in the system default font).
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofText(String text, Font font)
      Creates a stroke whose shape is a provided string, rendered in a provided font.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.ofVerticalLine(int length)
      Creates a vertical line stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.outlined(float width)
      Transforms the last specified stroke shape from a filled (solid) shape into an outlined shape.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.rotated(double degrees)
      Rotates the last-specified stroke shape by a given amount.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.scaled(double xScale, double yScale)
      Scales (enlarges or reduces) the last-specified stroke shape.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.sheared(double xShear, double yShear)
      Shears (slants) the last-specified stroke shape.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.stroked(Stroke stroke)
      Transforms the last specified shape from a filled (solid) shape into a stroked shape that is stroked by the given stroke.
      ShapeStrokeBuilder ShapeStrokeBuilder.withoutInterpolation()
      When invoked, the stroke shape will be "stamped" only at each point where two paths join.
      static ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.withShape()
      Builds a stroke in which a shape is "stamped" along each point of the stroked path.
